sea ya at the cove.
Your neighborhood brewery to try something new, listen to live music, and enjoy our coastal vibes. Follow us for updates on events and live music at Cove Brewery.
unforgettable events.
At Cove Brewery, we go above and beyond to curate unforgettable events that keep our guests coming back for more. From themed parties celebrating local festivals to trivia nights and live music, our event calendar is filled with exciting experiences. You won't want to miss out on the events we have coming your way.

Scroll
dive into the cove.
Celebrating South Florida and proudly serving Deerfield Beach.
we’re creating waves.
Check out Deerfield’s first brewery!
THERE’s history behind our beer
Deerfield Beach has always been one of South Florida's iconic experiences. Anyone worth their salt knows that DFB is the perfect blend of old-school Florida, beach days, and nightlife. This is a one of a kind town.
The Cove is one of Deerfield’s original neighborhoods, and the cove shopping center has been serving up good times for over 50 years. It only seemed right to create a unique brewery that is dedicated to this community.
Photo credit: Local surfer Kelly Shogren and photographer Henry Bliss
We wanted to build a brewery that celebrates South Florida's fun in the sun lifestyle and create a one of a kind taproom that embodies everything that makes Florida great. One that feels like home.
We hope to see you and share good times with great people. Enjoy the taste of South Florida in a glass (or two) at the Cove Brewery.
FROM THE BEGINNING
Cove brewery happened when a few locals decided to make it their mission to create Deerfield Beach’s first brewery; a premium, Old Florida inspired brewery that celebrates South Florida’s beach and beer lifestyle and everything they love about the iconic location where it was built. They set out to honor Deerfield Beach’s roots, and design a high quality taproom that actually ‘ feels’ like Florida.
